title: MVC
content: MVC stands for Model-View-Controller and is a method of building a functional website and database.

title: Handlebars
content: When using the MVC method, a great tool to create different html pages is handlebars.js!

title: MySQL
content: MYSQl has been around for a long time and is one of the most trusted options for creating a functional database.

title: Web Development
content: A growing industry that provides plenty of opportunity for growth. You will never have a dull moment, as you will be constantly learning new things.
